remoteClasses.name: NuboFaceDetector
remoteClasses.doc: NuboFaceDetector interface. Documentation about the module

methods.name: showFaces
methods.doc: Show or Hide the faces in the video stream

params.name: viewFaces
params.doc: Determines wheter the detected faces will be displayed or not

methods.name: detectByEvent
methods.doc: To indicate to the algorithm if process all the images or only when it receives an event

params.name: event
params.doc: 0 (default) => process all the frames without constraints; 1 => process only when we receive a specific event such as motion detection

methods.name: sendMetaData
methods.doc: The faces detected (x,y,width,height) are sent as metadata

params.name: metaData
params.doc: 0 (default) => metadata are not sent; 1 => metadata are sent
